name: Hyperthyroidism
title: Hyperthyroidism
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for a diagnosis of hyperthyroidism.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diagnosis for thyrotoxicosis, both with and without thyrotoxic crisis or storm, and with and without presence of goiter.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent a diagnosis for neonatal thyrotoxicosis.)
